title: Analyst
skills used: Skills Used: Python, JavaScript, AWS Services, Git, BitBucket, Node.js, SAPIO LIMS, REST APIs, Jira
expandedText: As Analyst, I led a data migration project, where I migrated data from a legacy archival system to SAPIO LIMS system. I spearheaded the design, development and successful implementation of automated regression testing script for a Node.js repository.

title: Programmer Analyst
skills used: Skills Used: Python, AWS Lambda, Step Functions, S3, Event Bridge, SQS, RDS, REST APIs, Oracle SQL, PostgreSQL Benchling ELN, E-Notebook ELN, Git, GitHub
expandedText: As Programmer Analyst, I led the migration of data from E-Notebook to Benchling ELN using direct database queries for data extraction and APIs for data ingestion. Spearheaded the design, development and deployment of a cloud-native solution, integrating inhouse pipelines with Benchling using AWS services such as Step Function, Lambda, RDC, S3, Event Bridge and SQS Queue.

title: Assosiate Analyst
skills used: Skills Used: Spring Framework, Java, Python, Benchling ELN, REST APIs, MySQL, Subversion
expandedText: As Associate Analyst, I built a full scale web application as part of training project using Spring Boot, Hibernate(For database connectivity) and MySQL database. I supported in Migration of data from a file archival system to Benchling ELN. I developed an automated data extraction tool using python for migrating data from Labguru ELN to Benchling ELN using APIs for data extraction and ingestion.
